title: Bronze player looking for team mates/team :)
body:
Hi guys,
I'm a fairly new League player looking for some team mates/a team to play with. Almost all of my friends are non-gamers, so yeah just casting the net out here cause solo queue does my head in.

My better roles are top, support and mid if that matters.

So yeah, if anyone in Bronze or whatever (I'm in bronze 3) is looking for someone who is a team player, let me know!

Cheers

replies.body: Hit me up I would be keen. I am getting sick of solo bronze que. I always end up getting out of B5, do good in B4 and end back in B5 again because of the constant AFKers and KSers. Need a change of pace. I play mid, adc and top. I am also learning to jungle and can kinda supp. I also know someone else who is in either B1 or B2 who may be interested who mains Supp, his summoner name is Melchior119 I think, mine is RebirthKnight. Hopefully I see you around...
Would love to play add me if interested
Sweet man, I'm in the U.S for another 5 days, will add when I'm home :)
Yeah i would love to join a team like this i am bronze 4 and play~~ top/supp/mid/jg/adc~~ (mostly top/supp) :D

I play the game casually and want to start looking for team mates around the same level (Bronze). 
Feel free to add me (Uniucky) and we will play together
I'd love to get in on this. Been wanting to play ranked teams for a while.
im fairly new to pvp but im also looking for a team/pvp players if your interested feel free to add me and im happy to play
